Description: Painted linen depicting Astnefret seated before an offering table receiving lustrations from her daughter Iy and son Penpare.
Curator's comments: Probably from Deir el-Medina (R. J. Demaree pers. comm.)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1986 Jun-Oct, Carmarthen Museum, A son of Luxor's Sands 1989 Jan-Mar, South Florida Science Museum, Imhotep's Egypt: Discovering Ancient Egyptian Technology 1989 Apr-Jun, Miami, Museum of Science, Imhotep's Egypt: Discovering Ancient Egyptian Technology 1989 Jul-Aug, Jacksonville Museum of Science History, Imhotep's Egypt: Discovering Ancient Egyptian Technology 1995 Feb-May, Atlanta, Emory University, Reflections of Women in the New Kingdom
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Robert Ludwig Mond
